batchCalls(bytes[]).code: function batchCalls(bytes[] data) external nonpayable returns (bytes[] results)

data.description: An array of ABI encoded function calls to be called on the contract.

results.description: An array of abi-encoded data returned by the functions executed.

batchCalls(bytes[]).notice: Executing the following batch of abi-encoded function calls on the contract: `data`.
batchCalls(bytes[]).details: Allows a caller to batch different function calls in one call. Perform a `delegatecall` on self, to call different functions with preserving the context.

title: Interface of the [LSP-0-ERC725Account] standard, an account based smart contract that represents an identity on-chain.
author: Fabian Vogelsteller <fabian@lukso.network>, Jean Cavallera (CJ42)
name: ILSP0ERC725Account
